title: Wind Solar Wind Experiment (SWE) strahl detector, ~1/2 sec solar wind electron pitch-angle distributions at ~12 sec cadence - K. Ogilvie (NASA/GSFC)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/wind/swe/strahl0/1995/wi_strahl0_swe_19950101_v01.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 57.1966% of the 7451 timesteps. Cadence = 6397 [ms] = PT6.397S.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Nominal time of strahl measurement (milliseconds since 1 AD).

parameters.name: f_strahl
parameters.description: f_strahl intensities versus Phi and Theta angles in sweep energy order (log scaled animated gifs)

parameters.name: f_strahl_lin
parameters.description: ---> f_strahl (linear scaled). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['f_strahl']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: f_antistrahl
parameters.description: f_antistrahl intensities versus Phi and Theta angles in sweep energy order (log scaled animated gifs)

parameters.name: f_antistrahl_lin
parameters.description: ---> f_antistrahl (linear scaled). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['f_antistrahl']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: f_strahl_counts
parameters.description: f_strahl_counts intensities versus Phi and Theta angles in sweep energy order (log scaled animated gifs)

parameters.name: f_strahl_counts_lin
parameters.description: ---> f_strahl_counts (linear scaled). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['f_strahl_counts']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: f_antistrahl_counts
parameters.description: f_antistrahl_counts intensities versus Phi and Theta angles in sweep energy order (log scaled animated gifs)

parameters.name: f_antistrahl_counts_lin
parameters.description: ---> f_antistrahl_counts (linear scaled). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['f_antistrahl_counts']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: phi_strahl
parameters.description: Phi (GSE) associated with unit vector pointing in electron velocity direction, for the strahl distribution.

parameters.name: phi_antistrahl
parameters.description: Phi (GSE) associated with unit vector pointing in electron velocity direction, for the antistrahl distribution.

parameters.name: theta
parameters.description: Theta (GSE) associated with unit vector pointing in electron velocity direction

parameters.name: energy
parameters.description: energy (in eV) of the sampled electrons used to construct the f_strahl and f_antistrahl distributions
